attributes.action: `CAR DRIVERS` WHO ARE A LAW ONTO THEMSELVES ON THE HIGHWAY,NEED, TOUGH POLICE ACTION.
attributes.additional_details:
"CAR DRIVERS` WHO ARE A LAW ONTO THEMSELVES ON THE HIGHWAY,NEED, TOUGH POLICE ACTION.

Responsible department: Department for Transport


WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT TO SEE A `STOP` PUT ON `CAR DRIVERS` WHO TAKE NO NOTICE OF ROAD MARKINGS, SPEED SIGNS, DRIVE IN THE MIDDLE OF THE ROAD, CUT IN AND OUT OF MOVING TRAFFIC, SPEED, THIS NEEDS `TOUGH POLICE ACTION` AS THEY HAVE GOT OUT OF CONTROL EVEN THOUGH THEY ARE KILLED EACH YEAR, WHICH DOES NOT SUPPRISE ME AND OTHERS ON WHAT WE SEE EVERYDAY, THE CAR DRIVER HAS HAD THE BLAME TO SOME RESPECT WHICH IS RIGHT, IF THEY ABIDE BY THE `HIGHWAY` CODE WHICH MOST DO NOT,THEY WOULD SAVE THERE OWN LIVES, SEEMS ONE LAW FOR THEM AND ANOTHER FOR THE POOR MOTORCYCLIST, THE POLICE SHOULD BE TAKING ACTION AGAINST THEM BUT FAIL ON IT.

LETS GET THE SAME RULES FOR ALL AND BRING DOWN THE DEATH/INJURY RATE, COMMON SENSE.
